attributes.action: Decrease the levels of CO2 being emmited in to the atmosphere by 95% by 2020
attributes.additional_details:
It surely should have been a wake up call to everyone that we have now only 18months to reverse climate change instead of the 12 years that we previously had.

ACT NOW FOR THE SAKE OF THE WORLD!!!!!!!
attributes.background: We have 18 months to reverse climate change people need to wake up especially the government and take serious action immediately for the future of our planet, the evidence is there , people die from air pollution, natural disasters caused by climate change , droughts no God will help us now.
